content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'll be happy to help you get scheduled for plumbing work. Can I get your name, please?
Thank you, Megan. Can you please provide the address where you need the plumbing service?
It's 123 Main...wait, sorry, I can't remember the zip code, hold on. Or maybe it's 321 Oak Ave? I just moved. This is confusing.
No worries—could you please clarify the full address, including the street, city, and zip code, so I can assist you best?
It's either 123 Main St or 321 Oak Avenue. Dang it, I honestly can't remember which one is this house. Maybe you can look it up by my name?
I'm sorry, but I need the complete address to proceed. Could you double-check and provide the street address with city and zip code? If you need more time, I can wait.
It looks like I'm having trouble with the address format. I'm going to get a human operator to help you out.
reason: Agent failed to collect valid address; requesting operator assistance.

content: Hi Megan, I'm Sarah from XYZ Home Services. Don't worry—I'll get this sorted for you! Could you tell me which city you're in? That will help us narrow down your current address between 123 Main St and 321 Oak Avenue.
Oh, sorry, I'm in Springfield. I think it's Oak Avenue, now that I look at my mail.
Thank you, Megan! So the address will be 321 Oak Avenue, Springfield. I'll get your plumbing appointment set up for you. Can you let me know your preferred date and time for a visit?
